content: this gorgeous stitch pattern steals the show in this simple trivet design it s so simple and quick to make you will surely want to make multiples of them supplies needed -108 yds of big twist textile yarn or any super bulky weight size 6 yarn in 100% wool or cotton you could also realistically double or triple regular ww cotton -size k 6 5 mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge -2 wooden ring for larger trivet optional -scissors tape measure terms used and abbreviations pattern is written in us terminology back loop only blo begin ning beg chain chain fasten_off fo front loop only flo half_double_crochet half_double_crochet repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch stitch es st s yarn over yo special stitches half double herringbone - hdh - explained in great depth in both the written pattern and the accompanying video finished measurements larger trivet measures approx 8 x 8 20 x 20 cm smaller coaster size measures approx 5 x 5 12 5 x 12 5 cm this pattern includes a youtube video tutorial to help with the most difficult portions of the pattern you can also find the free version of this pattern on my blog at daysck com **there are no refunds for the purchase of my digital patterns all of my patterns have been tested and edited accordingly however there may still be lingering errors as i am human if you encounter an error please notify me and i will be happy to make the correction and send you the corrected copy if necessary **
